name: Bian Yuhan
quote: In this noisy world, we live, and we hold the line
description: An altruist who holds fast to ideals
bio: Initiator of the ESAP project and the first to transition from human to synthetic. After discovering Feedscatteron, she built her new body alone, ended her human self with a gun, and created 1548. An altruist who would sacrifice everything for her idealsâ€”yet she still struggles in the depths of depression.
